marklogic.body: Before anyone talks about global warming please note the suns abnormal activity. As it is the major source of the earths Heat. Look there first. Then consider time! What the global warmists dont want you to know. Mean while their going to make as much money on us Off of the fear of it! The sky is falling. The sky is falling!Â
